summary: Comprehensive testing of Pasal Sathi shop management system completed. Backend API achieved 100% success rate (20/20 tests passed). Frontend UI testing successful with complete user flow validation including PIN authentication, dashboard, inventory management, sales processing, and reports generation. Minor modal overlay issue identified in navigation flow.

ui_bugs.issue: Modal overlay occasionally blocks navigation to settings page, requiring force click or modal dismissal
ui_bugs.workaround: Use force=True in clicks or dismiss modal before navigation

passed_tests: Dashboard stats display (today's sales, products count, low stock alerts)
Product management (create, view, update, bilingual names)
Sales flow (add to cart, checkout, payment type selection)
Reports generation (Excel/PDF export for sales and inventory)
All data-testid attributes for automated testing
